齍齍齍
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 皿, 齊, 資
Связанный символ (и): Блюдо, Ци, Цзы

齍字的基本解释

齍
zī
古代盛谷物的祭器：“凡祭祀，赞玉齍。”
古通“粢”，稷，谷物：“辨六齍之名物与其用。”

齍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zī］
［《廣韻》即夷切，平脂，精。］
(1)古代盛谷物的祭器。
(2)祀谷在器之称。
(3)通“粢”。谷物的总称。
(4)通“資”。钱财。

齍字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齊字部】　齍； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1531第16
【唐韻】卽夷切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】津私切，?音咨。【說文】黍稷器，所以祀者。【周禮·春官·大宗伯】奉玉齍。　又與粢同。【周禮·春官·世婦】共齍盛。　又【集韻】牋西切，音齎。又才詣切，音嚌。義?同。

齍字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
齍字的起名意思

暂无。

齍
Basic explanation of words
齍
zī
Ancient sacrificial vessel for holding grains: "Where offering sacrifices, praise the jade."
The ancient way of "粢", rice, grain: "Distinguish the name and use of Liu Zhi."
齍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zī］
["Guangyun" is cut, flat fat, refined. ]
(1) Ancient sacrificial vessels for holding grains.
(2) It is called the sacred valley in the device.
(3) Through "粢". The general term for cereals.
(4) Through "capital". money.
齍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Qi Zi Department] 　齍; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1531-16
[Tang Yun] 卽 Yi cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Jin private cut,? Yin consultation. [Said the text] millet ware, so the worshiper. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Da Zongbo】Feng Yukun.　Same as 粢 again. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Shi Fu】Together and prosperous.　[Jiyun] Jianxiqie, sound. Then he cut, sounded. Righteous? Same.
